name: qpid-java-broker-7.0.0
description: Qpid Java Broker - first release separated from the 0-x Client

issues.title: [Java AMQP 1.0] When unsubscribing a durable subscription, it should be resumed with durability NONE, expiry LINK_DETACH
Tests broker_0_9.queue.QueueTests.test_unbind_fanout and broker_0_9.queue.QueueTests.test_unbind_headers fail with 404, 'No such binding'
Earlier Qpid Java client: receiver issue with multi-transfer pre-settled messages
Joram test TopicSessionTest#testDurableSubscriber hangs against Java Broker when invoked a second time (qpid-jms-client 0.5.0)
BDBHAVirtualHostNodeRestTest.testDeleteMasterNode failed sporadically on Apache CI
[Java Broker] Creating multiple state transition methods on a ConfiguredObject should cause an error
[Java Broker] Direct memory QpidByteBuffer created in message conversion modules should be disposed as soon as possible after becoming unused
[Java Broker] ClosedSelectorException during shutdown
Management delete of a message may refund credit too early
Deleting a virtualhost leaves itself and the children in the configuration store
ProducerFlowControlTest#testSendTimeout test fails sprodically on 0-10 profiles
[Java Broker] Asynchronous message recoverer should always delete orphan messages from the store
Incorrect error message when editing "number of connection threads" of a virtual host
Statistics gathering screen label uses wrong unit
Heartbeat screen label uses wrong units
[Java Broker] The option to "overwrite configuration" on Main does nothing
[Java Broker, WMC] Clicking on any of dashboard widget titlebar icons  (collapse pane, edit, goto, or close) triggers widget dragging in IE
[Java Broker] Fix AbstractSystemMessageSource#pullMessage
Broker occasionally fails to report SUB-1003 in response to a consumer that has become suspended
[Java Broker] AmqpPort objects cannot be properly closed unless virtual hosts are closed
[Java Broker] If no virtualHostNode is provided, a PatternMatchingAlias should return the default virtual host node
[Java Broker] The timeout when waiting for a response from a server-initiated close should be configurable
[Java Broker] Fix state check in  ReplicatedEnvironmentFacade#tryToRestartEnvironment
[Java Broker] UpgradeFrom7To8#getConfigVersion should guard against NPE in case cursor is null
[Java Broker] ProtocolOutputConverterImpl$CompositeAMQBodyBlock#getSize and ProtocolOutputConverterImpl$SmallCompositeAMQBodyBlock#getSize should cast operands to long to avoid truncation to int
EncodingUtils#readLongAsShortString does not guard against the string containing characters not in the range '0'-'9'
Improve implementations of equal methods in various classes to be able to account for sub-classes
[Java Broker] The broker cannot recover durable Consumers (AMQP 1.0) which leaves it in an ERRORed state
[Java Broker] Make 0-10 CreditManagers work with Python client
[Java Broker] Upgrade of configuration from model version 3 fails
[Java Broker] Authentication using SimpleLDAP authentication provider fails with NPE when caching of authentication results is enabled(by default)
Metadata service does not set cache control headers
AbstractVirtualHost defines two state transitions from ERROR to ACTIVE
Ensure that HTTP threads always carry a ManagementConnectionPrincipal
Metadata loaded twice for recovered message
[Java Broker] Generic JDBC configuration store mistakenly is put into OPEN state in init
AMQP 1.0 - settled flag set incorrectly for transactional sessions in mode rcvSettleMode FIRST
Auto unboxing null from Discharge#getFail() cause NPEs
[Java Broker] On AMQP 1.0 ensure Flow is sent to client when producer flow control changes state
Broker may send a deleted message to a queue browser
[AMQP1.0] leak from Session_1_0#_outgoingUnsettled for long lived JMS auto-ack consuming session.
Ending an AMQP1.0 connection with consumer leaks the connection, session and objects related to the consumer
AMQChannel#receivedComplete is performed without the SessionPrincipal within the thread access controller context
[Java Broker, Documentation] Chapter "9.6. Flow to Disk" is inaccessible
VirtualHostNode name is not expanded before creating thread
"SEVERE: RuntimeException while executing runnable" reported by Guava to stderr if a state transition method throws exception
[AMQP 1.0] Enforce lifetime-policy DeleteOnClose
[Java Broker] Ensure DoOnConfigThread annotation is processed across compilation units
[Java Broker, WMC] In BDBHA 2-node group you should be able to configure priority
[Java Broker,amqp 1.0] Broker does not respond to Flow command with drain=true if queue is empty and prefetch is 0
[Java Broker] If ANONYMOUS-RELAY finds the destination it should defer the delivery outcome to the destination
[AMQP 1.0] producer message flow does not restart after disk-space based flow control relinquished
[AMQP 1.0] existing block state not applied to newly created sessions
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Remove non-standard support for UTF-16 Strings from the AMQP type system
PID file is not created during first start
[Java Broker] fix AbstractAMQPSession#getLocalTransactionOpen to support values > 1
[Java Broker] fix handling of broker type in configuration
[Java Broker] Reject AMQP 1.0 durable messages if no persistent store is configured
[Java Broker] Stop creating 'dead letter queue' for a durable subscription queue
[Java Broker] WebSocket transport does not respect AMQP idle timeout
[Java Broker] Runtime exception can be thrown by REST API on failure to create BDB HA Virtual Host Node
[Java Broker] CloudFoundry group provider plugin reports 404 errors from the service as 500 errors
[Java Broker, BDB] Close Cursor when LockConflictException is thrown
[Java Broker, BDB] AsyncRecovery and Queue#enqueue can contend for a BDB Lock potentially bringing down the broker
[Java Broker] Cannot create VirtualHostLogger with certain ACLs in place
[Java Broker, BDB HA] Indefinite hang when new node joins existing group but existing node is unresponsive
ConsumerPriorityTest#testLowPriorityConsumerDoesNotReceiveMessagesIfHigherPriorityConsumerAvailable occasionally fails on 0-10 path
[BDB HA] Cursor#getNext API misuse
[Java Broker, WMC] If ACL reload operation fails due to  malformed ACL rules, etc, the error is not reported back to the user invoking the operation
[Java Broker] Set response code to 500 when unexpected error occurs during REST call
[0-10] Re-encoding of the 0-10 message during computation of updateStatsOnEnqueue causes performance slow down
[Java Broker, WMC] Fix evaluation of context path in the Web Management Console
[Java Broker] Misplaced ch.qos.logback.classic.spi.Configurator services file prevents use of logback in the Broker without the Qpid logging-logback module
[Java Broker, WMC] Fix anonymous login to the WMC
[Java Broker] Allow multiple ports to be configured using dynamic port 0
[Java Broker] In AMQP 1.0 fix handling of channel Id > 2^15
[Java Broker] In AMQP 1.0 gracefully handle non-compliant performatives
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Hostname should be taken from SNI or sasl-init if it is not present in open
[Java Broker] Propagate current IO thread when switching protocol engine to facilitate the correct processing of pipelined requests
[Java Broker] Fix NPE in AbstractVirtualHost$MessageHeaderImpl when there is no user principal
[Java Broker] Enforce AMQP 1.0 channel-max correctly
[Java Broker] In AMQP 1.0 ensure we send Flow echo in a timely fashion
[Java Broker] In AMQP 1.0 settle incoming messages when rcv-settle-mode is default
[Java Broker] NPE in AbstractQueue#getOldestMessageArrivalTime when Queue was not opened
[Java Broker] Login attempt using SimpleLDAP might result in 500
[AMQP 1.0] producer message flow control should not be applied to transaction coordinator links
Sparsely occupied message buffers may lead to java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Direct buffer memory
[Java Broker] Flow to disk if allocated direct memory exceeds broker wide broker.flowToDiskThreshold
[Java Broker] [Derby Store] Unsigned byte type should be used when reading stored message metada type
[AMQP 1.0] NPE during consumer target delivery path
[Java Broker] 500 error whilst deleting a virtualhost.
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] NPE on connection when no default virtualhost exists
[Java Broker] Closing a virtualhost does not dispose QBBs associated with messages on queues
[Java Broker] Closing a virtualhost does not dispose QBBs still associated with pooled IO threads
[Java Broker, WMC] The webclient sasl implementation should always answer a challenge by sending back a response.
[Java Broker] Guard against NPE in 0-10 when storing messages without header
[Java Broker] AMQP Management Operation throws NPE when it cannot find the target object
[Java Broker] Support the sending of an incomplete unsettled map
[Java Broker] [AMQP 0-10] Producer flow control overflow policy is not triggered on breaching the threshold due to missing Session principal
[Java Broker] Asynchronous message store recoverer can delete message content for the message enqueued after broker startup
[Java Broker] [WebSocket] Websocket implementation must not assume that web socket frame contains a whole AMQP frame
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] Contradicting message-formats on multi transfer deliveries should result in error
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Test AMQQueueDeferredOrderingTest#testMessagesSentByTwoThreadsAreDeliveredInOrder failed with profile java-bdb.1-0
NPE logged at WARN during management view of messages whilst consumer active
Malformed annotated messages (message format 0) can lead to ClassCastException
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Transaction Coordinator Links are accumulated in LinkRegistry
[Java Broker] Queue that has been used as a alternative binding cannot be removed
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] expiryPolicy=SESSION_END seemingly not respected if connection closed abnormally
[Java Broker] Invalid routing key
[Java Broker] AMQP 1.0 publishing links do not register themselves with queues
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Message expiry should be driven from ttl header only
Can't start Java Broker with QPID_WORK set to a Windows path.
[Java Broker] [0-91] extension basic.nack does not release message for delivery elsewhere
[Java Broker] Qpid Logback plugin RollingPolicyDecorator tests fail since java.io.tmpdir pointed at directory containing parentheses
[Java Broker] Improve message recovery logging
[Java Broker] [ACL] Authorisation decisions about the access control provider itself considers its own local rules rather than those of the wider system
[Java Broker] Changes made to existing durable children of virtualhost not recorded to the configuration store after a virtualhost restart
[Java Broker] [ACL] A recovered RuleBasedVirtualHostAccessControlProvider doesn't tell the virtualhost about updates to its rule-state
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] Message grouping feature does not utilise group-id from the message properties
[Java Broker] JSON context substitution does not work with nested variables
[Java Broker] DerbyUtils MEMORY_STORE_LOCATION is incorrect
[Java Broker] AppenderUtilsTest does not work on Windows
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] Observing a message with a null object property cause 500 error to be sent to the browser
[Java Broker] SpawnedBrokerHolderTest fails on Windows
[CVE-2017-15701] [Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Improve handling of empty and overlarge frames
[Java Broker, AMQP 1.0] Discharging transaction after consumer link detach does not apply the correct outcomes
Logback Stack overflow exception whilst reporting fatal BDB JE error
[Java Broker] Memory compactor threw NPE during Broker shutdown
[Java Broker] [AMQP0-10] References to messages sent by $virtualhostProperties node retained by store
[Java Broker][AMQP 1.0] In some circumstances Broker fails to send Flow back when Flow with drain flag set is received from client
[AMQP1.0] Sending a large message to a client uses excessive heap memory
[Java Broker] Internal Oracle TLS classes leaked per connection when connecting the Qpid JMS Client
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] AccessControlException thrown on authorization of connection creation is caught in FrameHandler instead of AMQPConnection_1_0Impl
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Session leaks closed link endpoints
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] [AMQP0-9] Queue#ConsumerCountWithCredit statistic not decremented when consumer disconnects
Table Name Prefix is set to NULL if no prefix is provided instead of empty String
[Java Broker] [JDBCMessageStore] Some exception causes are hidden
[Java Broker] Queue delete (or routeToAlternate) leaves message instance records in the store
[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] Handle erroneous null termini cases
[Java Broker] MariaDB backed JDBC virtualhost truncates message content at 64K leading to Broker abnormal shutdown
[Java Broker, AMQP 1.0] Receiving a Flow with an unknown handle MUST result in a session error
[Qpid Broker-J] [AMQP1.0] Session_1_0#unacknowledgedMessageCount not wired up
[Broker-J] Links for shared durable subscribers are accumulated in the link registry

[Broker-J][WMC] The row is selected on click or double-click for grids on virtual host tab
[Broker-J][WMC] Change link to broker documentation in web management console
[Broker-J][AMQP 0-8...0-9-1] Commit on nontransacted session causes broker to crash
[Site] Update Qpid web site to replace references to Broker for Java with Broker-J
[0-91] [Publisher Confirms] basic.ack returned to client before message is sync'd to disk
[Java Broker] Implement wd12 version of the AMQP Management working draft
[Java Broker] Support connection and user level logging
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] support for shared subscriptions
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Add support for anonymous sending links
Ring policy type
Reject policy type
Authentication using expired certificate
Create system tests testing end-to-end message conversion
[Java AMQP 1.0] The default outcome for sources on the broker should increment the delivery count
[Java Broker] Configured model objects should have only one parent
[Java Broker] Refactor consumer closing functionality to make it consistent between different protocols
Management: Users should not be able to view an object to which they have no access
Inactive web management console session not automatically timed-out
Protocol layers should retain an association between a delivered message and the consumer to which it is delivered.
Enhance Java Broker documentation to include usage for AMQP 1.0
[Java Broker, WMC] Don't transmit inherited context variables by default
[Java Broker, WMC] REST requests for ConfiguredObjects should not return children by default
[Java Broker] Update Dojo to 1.12.2
[Java Broker] Simplify SASL authentication functionality across broker AMQP layers
[Java Broker] SiteSpecificTrustStore should use protocol default port when no port is specified
[Java Broker] SiteSpecificTrustStore does not provide helpful error messages when protocol is missing
Give sessions and consumers a descriptive name
WMC should permit the navigation from a consumer on a queue back to the connection
[Java Broker] Remove support for ACL checking based on the "immediate" flag
Log failed login attempts
Mature the AMQP message conversion layer (headers and content)
[Java Broker] Upgrade logback to 1.1.11 and SLF4J to 1.7.24
[Java Broker] MessageConverter should respect mimeType
[Java Broker] Refactor broker startup code, remove BrokerOptions
[Java Broker] Reduce the implementation burden of creating non-standard virtual hosts
[Java Broker] Reduce size of anonymous state change listener classes by using abstract base class
[Java Broker] Move queue statistics accounting into a separate class
[Java Broker] Remove redundant RecordDeliveryMethod interface/implementations
[Java Broker] Do all message delivery processing on the IO threads and remove the QueueRunner
[Java Broker] Add a ManagedOperation to allow selected retrieval of statistics from an object
[Java Broker] Reduce cost of calculating size of buffered data in NonBlockingConnection
Remove unnecessary Jetty dependency (jetty-client) from Broker
[Java Broker] Fix "&" vs "&&" typo in BooleanWriter from AMQP 1.0 codec
[Java Broker] Close stream in SSLUtil#readPrivateKey
[Java Broker] Invoke attribute methods on initialisation of reporting in Broker
Add serializationVersionId to the classes implementing Serializable
[Java Broker] Implement producer flow control in AMQP 1.0
[Java Broker] Tidy up AMQP 1.0 implementation
[Java] Replace AMQConstant class with constant integer error codes
Expose Broker version as a Virtualhost derived attribute
Use management to retrieve the Broker's version number
Improve performance-test maven pom to allow the convenient running of performance tests from Maven
Enhance model to expose meta-information about the current connection

[Java Broker] Do not allow the creation of Derby Virtual Hosts if the Derby JDBC driver is not present
Implement Virtualhost centric REST interface
Add competing consumer test to the performance test suite
[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] support Delayed Delivery with the JMS 2.0 client
Allow model to designate operation parameters as not nullable
[Java Broker] Refactor Consumer related interfaces
[Java Broker] Improve AMQP 1.0 codec to retain encoded message data

[Java Broker] [AMQP 1.0] Simplify the AMQP codec so that it always assumes that the buffer it is writing into is large enough

Expose the bound (i.e. listening) port number on Port model object

[AMQP 1.0] Maximum Delivery Count/Dead-lettering

[Java Broker] Where there is only one possibly type for a configured object, do not require it to be provided
Target Java 8+, i.e. drop support for Java 7
Separate Qpid Broker for Java and 0-x JMS Client in source tree
Remove SessionAdapter
Implement large transaction guard  restricting direct memory consumption by messages from uncommitted transactions on the connection

[Java Broker] [AMQP1.0] Support defaultOutcome handling
Protocol system test suite for AMQP 1.0

Allow annotation processor ConfiguredObjectRegistrationGenerator to handle incremental compilation
Add ability to turn off flow to disk

Allow exchange to exchange bindings to substitute the routing key
Add statistics panel to view tabs within the Web Management Console

Include statistics in API docs
Recover metadata into direct memory
